overview: A depressed son and an eccentric father enter into one joint construction project to get close to each other. Pretty soon things go to hell, both with the construction and theirs relationship. The son is lonely, dumped and depressed. The father is intoxicated and convinced that he will soon die. With tenderness and humor in the spirit of Lukas Moodysson, A complicated family relationship is displayed.
title: Jävla Pappa
